name: Femoral nerve
text: Femoral nerve innervates the anterior thigh muscles responsible for hip flexion and knee extension.

name: Obturator nerve
text: Obturator nerve innervates the medial thigh muscles involved in hip adduction.

name: Superior gluteal nerve
text: Superior gluteal nerve innervates gluteus medius, gluteus minimus, and tensor fasciae latae for hip abduction and pelvic stability.

name: Inferior gluteal nerve
text: Inferior gluteal nerve innervates gluteus maximus, the primary hip extensor.

name: Sciatic nerve
text: Sciatic nerve innervates the posterior thigh muscles and is the main nerve of the posterior compartment.

name: Tibial nerve
text: Tibial nerve innervates the posterior leg and plantar foot muscles responsible for plantarflexion and toe flexion.

name: Deep peroneal nerve
text: Deep peroneal nerve innervates the anterior leg and dorsum of the foot for dorsiflexion and toe extension.

name: Superficial peroneal nerve
text: Superficial peroneal nerve innervates the lateral leg muscles responsible for foot eversion.
